description: The artist’s Panda sculpture takes a leading role when he meets a girl standing in front of a Louis Vuitton store. Panda consumes the girl’s cell phone, and then the girl herself, who discovers a gateway to a psychedelic wonderland inside his stomach.
title: Louis Vuitton SUPERFLAT Monogram
